00036 void TestApplLayer::initialize(int stage)
00037 {
00038     BaseApplLayer::initialize(stage);
00039     if(stage == 0) {
00040         delayTimer = new cMessage( "delay-timer", SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER );
00041     }
00042     else if(stage==1) {
00043         scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand() * 10, delayTimer);
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00055 void TestApplLayer::handleLowerMsg( cMessage* msg )
00056 {
00057     ApplPkt *m;
00058     switch( msg->getKind() ){
00059     case BROADCAST_MESSAGE:
00060         m = static_cast<ApplPkt *>(msg);
00061   EV << "Received a broadcast packet from host["<<m->getSrcAddr()<<"] -> sending reply\n";
00062         sendReply(m);
00063         break;
00064     case BROADCAST_REPLY_MESSAGE:
00065         m = static_cast<ApplPkt *>(msg);
00066   EV << "Received reply from host["<<m->getSrcAddr()<<"]; delete msg\n";
00067         delete msg;
00068   break;
00069     default:
00070   EV <<"Error! got packet with unknown kind: " << msg->getKind()<<endl;
00071         delete msg;
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00083 void TestApplLayer::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00084     switch( msg->getKind() ){
00085     case SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER:
00086         sendBroadcast();
00087     delete msg;
00088     delayTimer = NULL;
00089   break;
00090     default:
00091       EV << "Unknown selfmessage! -> delete, kind: "<<msg->getKind() <<endl;
00092   delete msg;
00093     }
00094 }
00095 
00100 void TestApplLayer::sendBroadcast()
00101 {
00102     ApplPkt *pkt = new ApplPkt("BROADCAST_MESSAGE", BROADCAST_MESSAGE);
00103     pkt->setDestAddr(-1);
00104     // we use the host modules getIndex() as a appl address
00105     pkt->setSrcAddr( myApplAddr() );
00106     pkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00107 
00108     // set the control info to tell the network layer the layer 3
00109     // address;
00110     pkt->setControlInfo( new NetwControlInfo(L3BROADCAST) );
00111 
00112     EV << "Sending broadcast packet!\n";
00113     sendDown( pkt );
00114 }
00115 
00116 void TestApplLayer::sendReply(ApplPkt *msg)
00117 {
00118     simtime_t delay;
00119 
00120     delay = uniform(0, 0.01);
00121 
00122     msg->setDestAddr(msg->getSrcAddr());
00123     msg->setSrcAddr(myApplAddr());
00124     msg->setKind(BROADCAST_REPLY_MESSAGE);
00125     msg->setName("BROADCAST_REPLY_MESSAGE");
00126     sendDelayedDown(msg, delay);
00127 
00128     EV << "sent message with delay " << delay << endl;
00129 
00130     //NOTE: the NetwControl info was already ste by the network layer
00131     //and stays the same
00132 }
00133 
00134 void TestApplLayer::finish()
00135 {
00136     BaseApplLayer::finish();
00137   cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00138   delayTimer = NULL;
00139 }
